de.systemagmbh.tools.io
Class CSysFileFinderDir

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.io.CSysFileFinderDir
public final class CSysFileFinderDir
extends Object

This class searches for Files within directory structures.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Christian Wohanka

Method Detail

findFirstOccurrence

public static CSysFile findFirstOccurrence(String filename,
                                           String searchDir,
                                           boolean searchSubfolders)
Search for the first occurrence of a file in a directory structure.

Parameters:
filename - name of the searched file.
searchDir - directory to start searching.
searchSubfolders - flag indicating whether subdirectories should be included or not.
Returns:
the first found file or null.

findAllOccurrences

public static CSysFile[] findAllOccurrences(String filename,
                                            String searchDir,
                                            boolean searchSubfolders)
Search for all occurrences of a file in a directory structure.

Parameters:
filename - name of the searched file.
searchDir - directory to start searching.
searchSubfolders - flag indicating whether subdirectories should be included or not.
Returns:
array of found files. If no file was found the array is empty.

Parameters:

searchDir - directory to start searching.
